channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-23820|2024-08-03T03:51:46.067Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%203000%20series%20desktop%20processors%20%E2%80%9Cmatisse%22
item.description: Failure to validate the AMD SMM communication buffer may allow an attacker to corrupt the SMRAM potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-23821|2024-08-03T03:51:46.017Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%203000%20series%20desktop%20processors%20%E2%80%9Cmatisse%E2%80%9D
item.description: Improper access control in System Management Mode (SMM) may allow an attacker to write to SPI ROM potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-23831|2024-08-03T03:51:46.287Z -- amd -- amd%20%CE%BCprof
item.description: Insufficient validation of the IOCTL input buffer in AMD Î¼Prof may allow an attacker to send an arbitrary buffer leading to a potential Windows kernel crash resulting in denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-23818|2024-08-03T03:51:46.083Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient input validation on the model specific register: VM_HSAVE_PA may potentially lead to loss of SEV-SNP guest memory integrity.

item.title: CVE-2022-23825|2024-08-03T03:51:46.140Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: Aliases in the branch predictor may cause some AMD processors to predict the wrong branch type potentially leading to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-23829|2024-08-03T03:51:46.075Z -- amd -- amd%20ryzen%E2%84%A2%20threadripper%E2%84%A2%20pro%20processors%205900%20wx-series
item.description: A potential weakness in AMD SPI protection features may allow a malicious attacker with Ring0 (kernel mode) access to bypass the native System Management Mode (SMM) ROM protections.

item.title: CVE-2022-23830|2024-08-03T03:51:45.987Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: SMM configuration may not be immutable, as intended, when SNP is enabled resulting in a potential limited loss of guest memory integrity.

item.title: CVE-2022-23813|2024-08-03T03:51:45.988Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20epyc
item.description: The software interfaces to ASP and SMU may not enforce the SNP memory security policy resulting in a potential loss of integrity of guest memory in a confidential compute environment.

item.title: CVE-2022-23824|2024-08-03T03:51:46.071Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: IBPB may not prevent return branch predictions from being specified by pre-IBPB branch targets leading to a potential information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-23814|2024-08-03T03:51:46.049Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20epyc
item.description: Failure to validate addresses provided by software to BIOS commands may result in a potential loss of integrity of guest memory in a confidential compute environment.

item.title: CVE-2022-23823|2024-08-03T03:51:46.073Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: A potential vulnerability in some AMD processors using frequency scaling may allow an authenticated attacker to execute a timing attack to potentially enable information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-20570|2024-08-02T09:05:36.265Z -- amd -- alveo%E2%84%A2%20card%20%28ultrascale%E2%84%A2and%20ultrascale%2B%E2%84%A2%20based%29
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the configuration state machine may allow a local attacker to potentially load arbitrary bitstreams.

item.title: CVE-2023-20579|2024-08-02T09:05:36.910Z -- amd -- amd%20ryzen%E2%84%A2%205000%20series%20desktop%20processor%20with%20radeon%E2%84%A2%20graphics
item.description: Improper Access Control in the AMD SPI protection feature may allow a user with Ring0 (kernel mode) privileged access to bypass protections potentially resulting in loss of integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-20587|2024-08-02T09:05:36.265Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper Access Control in System Management Mode (SMM) may allow an attacker access to the SPI flash potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-2193|2024-08-01T19:03:39.165Z -- amd -- cpu
item.description: A Speculative Race Condition (SRC) vulnerability that impacts modern CPU architectures supporting speculative execution (related to Spectre V1) has been disclosed. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to disclose arbitrary data from the CPU using race conditions to access the speculative executable code paths.

item.title: CVE-2024-2193|2024-07-18T15:31:14.331Z -- amd -- cpu
item.description: A Speculative Race Condition (SRC) vulnerability that impacts modern CPU architectures supporting speculative execution (related to Spectre V1) has been disclosed. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to disclose arbitrary data from the CPU using race conditions to access the speculative executable code paths.

item.title: CVE-2023-20570|2024-06-04T17:20:10.498Z -- amd -- alveo%E2%84%A2%20card%20%28ultrascale%E2%84%A2and%20ultrascale%2B%E2%84%A2%20based%29
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the configuration state machine may allow a local attacker to potentially load arbitrary bitstreams.

item.title: CVE-2023-20587|2024-02-13T19:32:33.392Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper Access Control in System Management Mode (SMM) may allow an attacker access to the SPI flash potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-20579|2024-06-04T17:20:09.206Z -- amd -- amd%20ryzen%E2%84%A2%205000%20series%20desktop%20processor%20with%20radeon%E2%84%A2%20graphics
item.description: Improper Access Control in the AMD SPI protection feature may allow a user with Ring0 (kernel mode) privileged access to bypass protections potentially resulting in loss of integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-31347|2024-02-13T19:18:51.045Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Due to a code bug in Secure_TSC, SEV firmware may allow an attacker with high privileges to cause a guest to observe an incorrect TSC when Secure TSC is enabled potentially resulting in a loss of guest integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-31346|2024-06-04T17:19:15.832Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Failure to initialize memory in SEV Firmware may allow a privileged attacker to access stale data from other guests.

item.title: CVE-2024-21979|2024-06-04T17:37:40.519Z -- amd -- amd%20software%3A%20adrenalin%20edition
item.description: An out of bounds write vulnerability in the AMD Radeonâ¢ user mode driver for DirectXÂ®Â 11 could allow an attacker with access to a malformed shader to potentially achieve arbitrary code execution.

item.description: An out of bounds write vulnerability in the AMD Radeonâ¢ user mode driver for DirectXÂ®Â 11 could allow an attacker with access to a malformed shader to potentially achieve arbitrary code execution.

item.description: A Speculative Race Condition (SRC) vulnerability that impacts modern CPU architectures supporting speculative execution (related to Spectre V1) has been disclosed. item.title: CVE-2021-46757|2024-06-18T18:46:02.340Z -- amd -- amd%20ryzen%E2%84%A2%20embedded%205000
item.description: Insufficient checking of memory buffer in ASP Secure OS may allow an attacker with a malicious TA to read/write to the ASP Secure OS kernel virtual address space potentially leading to privilege escalation.

item.description: An out of bounds write vulnerability in the AMD Radeonâ¢ user mode driver for DirectXÂ®Â 11 could allow an attacker with access to a malformed shader to potentially achieve arbitrary code execution.
